name: Final Boss (CapitolJay)
description:
Play as an invading monstrosity from the great beyond come to wipe us all out in the final hours of 2020.  Try to do as much damage as you can to the city before midnight.

  • Controls
    • WASD - Move around
    • Mouse - Rotate left to right
    • Mouse button - Fire a meteor at the buildings

Used sound effects from Kenney, OpenGameArt and the FreeSound Archive
